name: Root Of Life
description:
Root Of Life is a Puzzle adventure game.
The design is heavily inspired by Inside (Playdead).
You are the last Human in the planet and in charge of it's last plant. You need to get the plant into safety, at all costs.  

The entire gameplay of the game revolves around the use of the plant in your backpack.  It helps you breath in the arsh environment of the planet.  You can climb obstacles, reach impossible heights and try to complete your quest to ultimately save the last plant on Earth. 

Controller : Xbox one or keyboard 

Credits : 

-- Developpement 
- Alizée Bessim-Gagné
